title: Google PPC and Meta Ads Expert
job_overview:
We are looking for someone who has the experience to create Upgrade to see actual info campaigns for Google and Facebook Ads, as well as fine tune them based on the data.

This would be for a service based business with physical addresses, running campaigns to certain zip code locations.

The ideal candidate would have a deep understanding of the ads ecosystems, as well as the following:
- Be capable of designing high converting landing pages
- Have deep understanding of copywriting
- Be familiar with tracking and reporting software in order to provide updates on results
- Understand how to split test ads, landing pages, and more.

Pay rates can vary depending on experience - however, if you can prove that you get results, we are willing to pay top wages. This can be a part time job, or a full time job if you have other Upgrade to see actual info or Facebook marketing skills, or a gig.
